429.message:
[429] The maximum number of requests per minute was exceeded.

The limits are 300 requests per minute in the Sandbox environment and 600 requests per minute in the Production environment.

In the future, to increase throughput, the service will change this per-environment limit to a per-user limit.

For more info please consult the FAQ on Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central API documentation page at the following address:
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/business-central/dev-itpro/administration/operational-limits-online#FAQsUser.
